question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. person with black backpack on the left
B. train station info board
C. None
D. None

options.A: person with black backpack on the left

triage_reason: The train station info board is clearly positioned further back in the scene, behind the people and the railing, while the person with the backpack is closer to the foreground.
